amplifyuibuilder:AppId.description: Filters access by the app ID

amplifyuibuilder:ComponentsId.description: Filters access by the component ID

amplifyuibuilder:EnvironmentName.description: Filters access by the backend environment name

amplifyuibuilder:ThemesId.description: Filters access by the theme ID

aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access based on the tags that are passed in the request

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access based on the tags associated with the resource

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access based on the tag keys that are passed in the request
